model.spreadsheet

Class Statistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.spreadsheet.Statistics

  • public class Statistics
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the statistics that are calculated and displayed in the stats view table. This class contains a stat name, a value, an assignment that the statistic belongs to, and a list of students that belong to the current course
    Author:
    Kevin Feutz
